attributes.action: Abolish VAT charges to NHS for supply of GP Locums through Recruitment Companies
attributes.additional_details:
VAT charges for the supply of General Practitioner Locums within the NHS is becoming costly for the General Practices that require GP Locum cover. A General Practice based within the NHS does not pay VAT, but yet Recruitment Agencies have to charge VAT to the practices.

With the talk of General Practices opening 0800-2000 7 days a week will only increase pressure on salaried General Practitioners.

Help abolish VAT charges to the NHS.
